import { Component, Inject } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { AuthService } from '../auth-service/auth-service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-fetch-data', templateUrl: './fetch-data.component.html', styleUrls: ['./fetch-data.component.css'] }) export class FetchDataComponent { public records: URLRecord[] = []; public AdditionURL: string = ''; constructor(public authService: AuthService, http: HttpClient, @Inject('BASE_URL') baseUrl: string) { http.get(baseUrl + 'urlservice/GetRecords').subscribe(result => { this.records = result; }, error => alert(error)); } onSubmit() { alert('Sended'); } } interface URLRecord { URL: string; UserLogin: string; }
